# recordPermission

**Instance Property**

The app’s permission to record audio.

## Declaration

```swift
var recordPermission: AVAudioApplication.recordPermission { get }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioApplication/requestRecordPermission(completionHandler:)] for more information.

## Requesting audio recording permission

- **requestRecordPermission(completionHandler:)**: Determines whether the app has permission to record audio.
- **AVAudioApplication.recordPermission**: Constants that indicate the app’s permission to record audio.
